amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt settlement agreements that pertain to providing restitution for a State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-363 to exempt settlement agreements that pertain to providing restitution for a State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 234 (Roll no. 577).
